items.definition: You're no use to me dead. Said to encourage someone to take a rest. Rarely literal.
Don't mess with me! (extremely strong warning - likely to be followed by violence)
Today is a good day for someone else to die.

items.word: Buy’ce gal, buy’ce tal / Vebor’ad ures aliit / Mhi draar baat’i meg’parjii’se / Kote lo’shebs’ul narit
items.pronunciation: [BOO-shay gahl, BOO-shay tahl Vair-BOR-ahd OO-rees AH-leet Mee DRAHR bah-TEE mayg-PAR-jee-SEH Koh-TAY loh SHEBS-ool-NAH-reet]
items.definition: A pint of ale, a pint of blood / Buys men without a name / We never care who wins the war / So you can keep your fame (drinking chant of Mandalorian mercenaries)
Those who no longer exist (the term is used for a group of Jango Fett’s handpicked clone commando instructors)

items.word: Gar ru kyramu kaysh, di’kut: tion’meh kaysh ru jehaati?
items.pronunciation: [Gahr roo keer-AH-moo kaysh, dee-KOOT: tee-ON-mey-kaysh roo je-HAHT-ee]
items.definition: You killed him, you moron: what if he was lying?
